welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bel Air South! Nestled in the heart of Harford County, our charming city is known for its scenic landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that Bel Air South has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves primarily Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves various airlines including American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves primarily Spirit Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
